body.name: Cetaphil Cream to Foam Face Wash, Hydrating Foaming Cream Cleanser, 8 oz, For Normal to Dry, Sensitive Skin, with Soothing Prebiotic Aloe, Hypoallergenic, Fragrance Free (Packaging May Vary)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 9 hrs 36 mins
features: CETAPHIL HYDRATING FOAMING CREAM CLEANSER: Gentle yet powerful foaming facial cleanser, clinically proven to effectively remove dirt, oil and makeup without drying the skin barrier
LEAVES SKIN FEELING SOOTHED AND HYDRATED: Hydrates and soothes as it cleanses, preserving the skin's moisture barrier and maintaining its natural pH
TRANSFORMS INTO A FOAMY TEXTURE: Formulated with soothing prebiotic aloe vera, hydrating glycerin and skin essential vitamins B5 (panthenol) and B3 (niacinamide)
DEVELOPED FOR EVEN THE MOST SENSITIVE SKIN: For normal to dry, sensitive skin. Hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic formula is free of fragrances and parabens
body.description: Be kind to your sensitive skin with CETAPHIL Hydrating Foaming Cream Cleanser, a creamy foaming cleanser that lathers into a rich foam, ideal for dry to normal skin. This gentle yet powerful foam face wash hydrates while cleansing without drying the skin barrier. Clinically proven to remove dirt, makeup, excess oils and impurities, it also helps to keep your skin's natural pH in check. Formulated with soothing prebiotic aloe vera and a dermatologist-backed blend of niacinamide (vitamin B3), panthenol (vitamin B5) and hydrating glycerin. This hypoallergenic, fragrance free and paraben free cleanser is clinically tested to be suitable on sensitive skin, effectively cleansing without irritation and without clogging pores, leaving your skin feeling soft and smooth.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CETAPHIL Hydrating Foaming Cream Cleanser hydrates and soothes dry, sensitive skin while effectively cleansing the skin. It is clinically proven to remove pore-clogging oils, dirt and makeup while being gentle enough for everyday use, not stripping or over-drying the skin. This foaming facial cleanser is designed to maintain the skin's natural protective barrier and its natural pH, formulated with soothing prebiotic aloe vera to be gentle on the skin's microbiome. It also contains a dermatologist-backed blend of hydrating glycerin, panthenol (pro-vitamin B5) to hydrate, soothe and preserve the skin barrier, and niacinamide (vitamin B3) to help smooth skin’s texture and retain the skin’s moisture barrier. This nourishing cream-to-foam formula is soothing on dry, sensitive skin, transforming from a creamy lather to a bubbly foam that leaves the skin feeling hydrated after cleansing. The gentle foaming cleanser is hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic, paraben free and fragrance free, dermatologist tested and clinically tested on sensitive skin. Care for sensitive skin with the help of CETAPHIL. A weakened skin barrier lets more water out while letting irritants in, both of which can lead to dryness and sensitivity. By helping to strengthen and reinforce the skin barrier, CETAPHIL skincare products defend against 5 signs of skin sensitivity - dryness, irritation, roughness, tightness and a weakened skin barrier.

CETAPHIL is a Dermatologist Recommended Sensitive Skincare Brand used around the world by millions of people with sensitive skin. CETAPHIL cleansers effectively yet gently clean without stripping or leaving skin feeling dry and tight. Developed for and clinically tested by dermatologists to be proven gentle on sensitive skin.

Cleanse skin with a gentle yet effective cleanser morning and night Ideal for dry to normal, sensitive skin, CETAPHIL Hydrating Foaming Cream Cleanser hydrates as it cleans to remove dirt, makeup and impurities while preserving the skin's natural moisture barrier. Formulated with prebiotic aloe to respect the skin's microbiome, it gently cleanses without stripping skin of its essential oils or leaving the skin tight or overly dry. Follow with a CETAPHIL moisturizer to lock in hydration After cleansing, quickly follow with a facial moisturizer while skin is still damp to draw water into the skin and lock it in for long lasting hydration. Using a moisturizer such as CETAPHIL Rich Hydrating Cream with hyaluronic acid instantly rehydrates and strengthens the skin's natural moisture barrier to soothe skin and protect it from dryness all day and night, so the skin looks and feels refreshed. Protect the skin with a nourishing SPF moisturizer During the day, it is also recommended to use a facial SPF moisturizer with sun protection. CETAPHIL Daily Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 delivers nourishing hydration that locks in vital moisture and protects your skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays. Complete your sensitive skin care routine with CETAPHIL A daily facial skin care routine with CETAPHIL cleansers and moisturizers designed for your skin type will help to defend against 5 signs of skin sensitivity and leave your skin feeling refreshed and hydrated. All CETAPHIL products are effective yet non-irritating and dermatologist tested for sensitive skin.

Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Skincare Benefit Convenient cloths that effortlessly remove waterproof makeup and gently cleanses skin Nourishing cream to foam removes dirt, oil & makeup without drying the skin barrier Lightweight oil-free lotion with SPF 15 hydrates while protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays Quick absorbing and non-greasy cream nourishes and rehydrates skin Unique gel-cream quickly absorbs to hydrate, brighten, and smooth under eye area Skin Type Sensitive Skin / All Skin types Sensitive Skin / Dry to Normal Skin Sensitive Skin / Dry to Normal Skin Sensitive Skin / Dry to Normal Skin Sensitive Skin / All Skin types Key Ingredients Aloe Vera, Chamomile, and Green Tea Hydrating Glycerin, Essential Vitamin B3, Pro Vitamin B5, and Prebiotic Aloe Avobenzone 3%, Octocrylene 10%, and Glycerin Hyaluronic Acid, Provitamin B5, Vitamin E, Vitamin C, and Olive Extract Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Chamomile Extract, Green Tea Extract, and Licorice Root Extract Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Won't Clog Pores (Non-comedogenic) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Fragrance-Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves a clean, moisturized feeling!
reviews.reviewText: This wash didn't dry out my skin and my face feels clean and smooth. My daughter likes it too. It's gentle enough for my sensitive skin, doesn't irritate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: I can finally say I have found the perfect facial cleanser that does not irritate my skin while also hydrating it! If you’re into skin care you know cleansing the face before applying products is important. This is affordable & works great, 10/10 recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and gentle
reviews.reviewText: I like that this product has limited ingredients. Foams while being creamy. Barely any fragrance is a plus for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Always recommend this brand
reviews.reviewText: Another one I love but can't get as often as I would like.My skin just feels wonderful after using this. It's very helpful with winter skin too (only things I hate about winter is dry skin and ice).It's not messy and has a good scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product at an even better price point!
reviews.reviewText: This face wash has really been improving my skin. My skin is always feeling refreshed, clean, and most of all: hydrated!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing cleanser good price good formula
reviews.reviewText: Wow this was amazing I am surprised this was amazing left my skin hydrated like a put a medium thick moisturizer on it it’s amazing very soothing top

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Deep cleans and leaves skin soft and moisturized
reviews.reviewText: Great product, cleans very thoroughly without drying out skin. I’m already on my 2nd bottle and love this product because it works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The skin on my face is always dry, worsens in winter after exactly 2 weeks of use I have a very beautiful moisturized skin, I apply a moisturizer after using this.Now don't let it get into your eyes!!!! It is so painful, even irrigation with water does not help it and the discomfort lasts a long time.I will continue to use it carefully.
